name: m
description: Documentation for the M project, a data oriented programming language for game developers.
author: Martin Azpillaga Aldalur

scripts.precommit: npm run lint && npm run links && npm run good
scripts.prepush: npm run summary && npm run pandoc
scripts.summary:
find Guides | sort | sed -E "/\.[^ m][^ d]*$/d;/^\.$/d;/README/d;/SUMMARY/d;s/[^/]*\//  /g;s/\.md//g;s/[0-9]+\. //g;s/(\s*)(.*)/\1* [\2]/g;s/  //" > names && find Guides | sort | sed "/\.[^m ][^d ]*$/d;/^\.$/d;/README/d;s/\([^.][^m][^d]\)$/\1\/README.md/g;/SUMMARY.md/d;s/ /%20/g;s/\(\s*\)\(.*\)/\1(\2)/g" > links && printf "# Summary

* [What is M](README.md)

" > SUMMARY.md && paste -d "" names links >> SUMMARY.md && rm names && rm links
